body:
Comment 6: 
i can reproduce this on Mac OS X 10.6.8.

I can't run any gcc-compiled program in the binary distributions (both 386 and amd64
version are affected): all of them will show "Illegal instruction" when run, and gdb
doesn't provide anything useful.
_Labels changed: added **priority-asap**, **go1.1**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
